name: Associazione Italiana Medici
goal:
ITALIAN MEDICAL ASSOCIATION (AIM) is a professional association between Italian physicians, founded with the aims
1) to promote the alliance between medicine and science
2) to represent Italian doctors on the basis of scientific and epidemiological evidence, of performances' measurement and assessment, of appropriateness and of a decision-making approach oriented to planning and programming
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Partecipazione in qualit√† di esperti a Health Workforce Planning and Forecasting Expert (SEPEN) Network
